creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: top of skirt in natural linen with narrow pleats held in place by cross stitch; mid section of skirt is patterned blue batik with unusual, complex red or yellow applique; lower portion of skirt has 2 horizontal bands divided by cross stitch; upper band has small multicolored tiny applied squares; black lower band with horizontal tapes in red and green
title: Skirt
